colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @024A *, ,(DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MCHED GROGS AEM CHID BKA' BCU DANG, NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS KYIS GZHAN LA PHAN SEMS KYIS SOG YUL 'DIR ME LHA MCHOD CING GA-YANG BLANG BA'I BKRA SHIS PO 'BYUNG 'DUG PA BSAM KYANG LHA SKYED PA MCHOD PA BYIN RLABS SOGS MED PA'I SOG YIG TSIG LHAD CAN GYI LUG DZIN 'GA' SNANG KYANG, RANG RE LHA BSKYED PA'I ME LHA MCHOD PA ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES PA'I BSKUL NGOR CHOG PAR SBYIN SREG GI THAB BSKYED DANG SLOB DPON PADMA'I MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS CHEN PO'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED KYI TSIG 'GA' ZHIG BSDUS NAS RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS @024B KYI MDZAD PA'I STENG DU NYER SPYOD LNGA SPEL TSIG DANG BCAS PA LUG BRANG MAR KHU CHANG LA SOGS PA 'BUL BA BSNON PA NI, NOM CHI KO'U SHRI CHOS RJES BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS SO, ,)
